title: Portfolio Website
description: Built a personal portfolio website with React to showcase projects, skills, and experience.
Implemented responsive design for consistent viewing across devices.

title: Bus Timetable Display - AT HOP Real-Time Dashboard
description: Built a real-time bus timetable display with Node.js and Express using the AT HOP API.
Integrated weather forecasts via Weather API.

title: Barcode Scanning Application with AI
description: Built a React Native app to scan barcodes and return sustainability details like carbon footprint and recyclability.
Integrated an AI model to analyze metadata and suggest eco-friendly alternatives.
Implemented real-time scanning UI, product lookup APIs, and Android performance optimizations.

title: Assignment Management System
description: Developed a web-based assignment platform using C# and ASP.NET MVC for lecturer-student workflows.
Implemented assignment creation, submission tracking, deadline management, and progress monitoring.
Added role-based access control for secure user access (student, lecturer).

title: Currency Recognition Using Deep Learning
description: Built a YOLO-based computer vision system to detect and recognize New Zealand dollar bills.
Collected and labeled custom datasets and trained the model for denomination recognition.
Implemented the pipeline in Python with PyTorch, OpenCV, and Ultralytics, outputting annotated video frames.

title: Explainable AI for Traffic Prediction
description: Explored interpretability in traffic prediction using SHAP for policy-relevant insights in intelligent transportation systems.
Built a machine learning model to predict traffic patterns and factor impacts on traffic flow.
Applied SHAP to improve transparency and trust in AI-driven traffic management.
